'''Frank Myers''' was engaged to [[Roxie Meyers]], a patient at [[Seattle Grace Mercy West Hospital]].

==History==
===Roxie's Surgery===
Roxie, Frank's fiancée, had lost 117 pounds and had excess skin around her abdomen. She was in the hospital to have the extra skin removed. She had also developed an umbilical hernia, so the two procedures were combined into one surgery. After surgery, Roxie and Frank got a sneak peek at her new abdomen and they were both pleased by the results.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
Frank was engaged to Roxie Meyers, whom he had been with for two years. Because of her excess skin from the weight loss, they'd never had sex, something they were eager to change after her surgery.
